author: Special Correspondent
text: Sumit Sharan, City Police Commissioner, has promulgated Regulatory Order under Section 41 of the Tamil Nadu City Police Act 1997 (extended to the city of Salem, Tiruchi and Tirunelveli) for a period of 15 days commencing from the midnight of March 13 to midnight of March 27 prohibiting assemblies, meetings, processions, agitations, demonstrations etc., without prior permission, an official press release issued here on Sunday said.
title: Regulatory order promulgated
